hero.title: Device platforms
hero.description: What's your molecule? With our device platforms, you don’t have to think about the self-service pen injector design. Because it's already there.

textMedia1.title: Introducing the Electronic Motorized Autoinjector
textMedia1.description: It's new, it's revolutionary, and it's here. Our flagship product Molly® is now available as an Electronic Motorized Autoinjector (EMAI).

cardsSection.description: We spend years and years developing new techniques to get them ready for the market. And they are here. Discover them now.
cardsSection.title: Our latest innovations

cards.title: Electronic Motorized Autoinjectors (EMAI)
cards.content: You've probably seen it already. EMAI is hitting our market with our flagship product Molly® as the first example.

cards.title: Needle Isolation Technology (NIT®)
cards.content: Our latest Maggie 5.0 autoinjector uses a permanently hidden needle, eliminating the need for patients to manually attach the needle before each injection.

productCards.title: Molly®
productCards.content: Our autoinjectors are designed to deliver precise doses of medication quickly and easily. They are used by patients with chronic conditions such as diabetes and multiple sclerosis.

productCards.title: Elexy®
productCards.content: We have 15 single-use injectors and multi-use pens to choose from. Which one fits your molecule?

productCards.title: Madie®
productCards.content: Our needle-free injectors are designed to deliver medication without the need for a needle. They are used by patients with conditions such as migraines and allergies.
